name: py-gosam

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
The package GoSam allows for the automated calculation of one-loop
amplitudes for multi-particle processes in renormalizable quantum field
theories.

dependencies.name: form
dependencies.description: FORM is a Symbolic Manipulation System.

dependencies.name: gosam-contrib
dependencies.description: Additional libraries for GoSam MC generator

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependencies.name: qgraf
dependencies.description:
Qgraf is a computer program that generates Feynman diagrams for various
types of QFT models

dependent_to.name: whizard
dependent_to.description:
WHIZARD is a program system designed for the efficient calculation of
multi-particle scattering cross sections and simulated event samples.

dependent_to.name: herwig3
dependent_to.description: Herwig is a multi-purpose particle physics event generator.
